column1: Little Goat Diner////I was SO excited to come here for brunch and get the Little Piggy goes to China (asian fusion sausage biscuit?? Yes
column2: please). The wait was 45 minutes at 8:30 on a Sunday morning (not terrible
column4: the atmosphere was noisy and slightly chaotic. The food tasted great
column5: but the smell of fish sauce on my breakfast sandwich was nauseating. The biscuit was amazing and the sausage was good
column6: but the sauce left me wanting. Overall
